𒄷𒄭𒋫𒌅 mut-ta-tu mitte “middle, half”

scrotum / corpus 𓈎 𓄿 𓃀 𓄲 𓈇 (interior)

đ := dth:ṯ/ḏ/d/t/th/ð/δ/s =: 𓏏 ðhis þought ɟ:=dj ↔ ɣ
